title: New: Brooke Bentham – Oliver
content:
Covered Brooke Bentham’s debut offering back in 2014; and the North East singer-songwriter has been rather quiet since then.

Now, with the traces of her previous tracks removed from the internet, as is so often the case, she’s re-emerging with an exquisite new number; Oliver. Again, showcasing a vocal that rivals pretty much any around at this moment in time, it’s hopefully the start of more releases to come. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
